strings.ESPURGE_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+20%</style> de alcance e <style=cIsDamage>+10%</style> de dano bônus
strings.ESPOISONBREATH_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+15%</style> de tamanho e <style=cIsDamage>+10%</style> de dano bônus
strings.ESZAPPORT_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: style=cIsUtility>+10%</style> de distância e <style=cIsDamage>+20%</style> de dano bônus
strings.ESINVISSPRINT_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+10%</style> de velocidade de movimento e <style=cIsUtility>+4m</style> de alcance atordoador ao sair da invisibilidade
strings.ESMAGICBULLET_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+5%</style> de dano por ricochete e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> ricochete a cada 2 níveis
strings.ESAUTOSHOTGUN_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+0.05</style> coeficiente de proc por bala e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> bala a cada 2 níveis
strings.ESDEBUFFNADE_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+20%</style> de dano e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> carga a cada 2 níveis
strings.ESCOMBATSHOTGUN_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+0.1</style> coeficiente de proc por bala e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> bala a cada 2 níveis
strings.ESDASH_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+10%</style> de buff de dano por 2 segundos após avançar
strings.ESTESLAMINE_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+10%</style> de dano, <style=cIsUtility>+10%</style> de alcance, e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> pulso a cada dois níveis
strings.ESMICROMISSILES_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+10%</style> de dano total e <style=cIsUtility>+10%</style> de alcance de explosão
strings.ESCLUSTERARROW_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+10%</style> de dano na explosão primária/biribinha e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> biribinha
strings.ESSHIELDSPLOSION_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+10%</style> alcance e <style=cIsHealing>+5%</style> de vida máxima para barreira retornada
strings.ESSLASHPORT_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+20%</style> de dano e <style=cIsUtility>+0.1</style> coeficiente de proc
strings.ESNANOBOTS_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsHealing>+20%</style> de cura extra, <style=cIsDamage>+10%</style> de dano, e <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> enxame por inimigo a cada 2 níveis
strings.ESROOT_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+4m</style> de alcance e <style=cIsHealing>+10%</style> de barreira gerada por acerto
strings.ESROOT_UG_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>+4m</style> radius and <style=cIsHealing>+10%</style> barrier gained per hit
strings.ESSLASHPORT_UG_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>+20%</style> de dano e <style=cIsUtility>+0.1</style> coeficiente de proc
